#!/bin/bash
sudo su
apt-get update && apt-get upgrade -y
sudo apt-get install ruby -y
sudo apt-get install wget -y
cd /home/ubuntu
apt install python-pip -y
pip install awscli
var1=""
var2=""
var3="ap-south-1"
var4="json"
cat >/home/ubuntu/.aws/credentials EOF1
[default]
aws_secret_access_key = "$var1"
aws_access_key_id = "$var2"
EOF1
cat >/home/ubuntu/.aws/config EOF2
[default]
 region = "$var3"
 output = "$var4"
EOF2
aws s3 cp s3://aws-codedeploy-us-east-2/latest/install . --region us-east-2
chmod +x ./install
sed -i "s/sleep(.*)/sleep(10)/" install
./install auto
sudo service codedeploy-agent start
apt-get install apache2 -y
sudo service apache2 restart
sudo  adduser lakhan361
cd /home/lakhan361
mkdir .ssh 
chmod 700 .ssh
cd .ssh
touch authorized_keys
chmod 600 authorized_keys
echo ssh-rsa  >> authorized_keys
sudo chown -R lakhan361  /home/lakhan361/.ssh/
cd 
mkdir /tmp/ssm
cd /tmp/ssm
wget https://s3.amazonaws.com/ec2-downloads-windows/SSMAgent/latest/debian_amd64/amazon-ssm-agent.deb
dpkg -i amazon-ssm-agent.deb
